metadata.description: Specify your Power Automate environment region/cloud: Commercial, GCC, GCC High, or DoD.

parameters.$filter: cat_agentid eq '@{items('Apply_to_each:_Agents')?['ID']}' and cat_environmentid eq '@{triggerBody()['text']}' and cat_name eq '@{items('Apply_to_each:_Agents')?['Name']}'

inputs.name: ErrorMessage
inputs.value:
AgentID: @{items('Apply_to_each:_Agents')?['ID']}@{if(
    not(empty(body('Perform_an_unbound_action:_Agent_Inventory_Data_Load')?['error/message'])),
    concat(
        ', PluginError: "',
        body('Perform_an_unbound_action:_Agent_Inventory_Data_Load')?['error/message'],
        '"'
    ),
    ''
)}@{if(
    or(
        not(empty(outputs('Run_a_Child_Flow:_Agent_Inventory_grandchild_for_component_update')?['Body']?['errormessage'])),
        not(empty(outputs('Compose:_Flow_Connection_Update_Error'))),
	not(empty(outputs('Compose:_Agent_Test_Configured_Update_Error')))
    ),
    concat(
        ', ComponentError: "',
        if(
            empty(outputs('Run_a_Child_Flow:_Agent_Inventory_grandchild_for_component_update')?['Body']?['errormessage']),
            '',
            concat(
                'PromptUpdateError: ''',
                outputs('Run_a_Child_Flow:_Agent_Inventory_grandchild_for_component_update')?['Body']?['errormessage'],
                ''''
            )
        ),
        '  ',
        if(
            empty(outputs('Compose:_Flow_Connection_Update_Error')),
            '',
            concat(
                'ConnectionUpdateError: ',
                outputs('Compose:_Flow_Connection_Update_Error')
            )
        ),
	'  ',
        if(
            empty(outputs('Compose:_Agent_Test_Configured_Update_Error')),
            '',
            concat(
                'AgentTestConfiguredUpdateError: ',
                outputs('Compose:_Agent_Test_Configured_Update_Error')
            )
        ),
        '"'
    ),
    ''
)},

Compose:_Flow_Connection_Update_Error.inputs: Flow connections update is failed with error

parameters.$filter:
contains(cat_configurationtypescodes,'1') and (
(cat_copilotid eq '@{items('Apply_to_each:_Agents')?['ID']}' and cat_dataverseurl eq '@{items('Apply_to_each:_Agents')?['EnvironmentUrl']}')
or (cat_agentidentifier eq '@{items('Apply_to_each:_Agents')?['SchemaName']}' and cat_environmentid eq '@{items('Apply_to_each:_Agents')?['EnvironmentID']}')
)

Compose:_Agent_Test_Configured_Update_Er.inputs: Agent Test Configured update is failed with error
